content.html: If you see me being anti-social and looking sad, it's because I lost a dog, had my identity demeaned, and had my work trivialized all within the span of a few hours. Today is absolute bullshit. I hate that I can't accept a hug right now.
content.value:
If you see me being anti-social and looking sad, it's because I lost a dog, had my identity demeaned, and had my work trivialized all within the span of a few hours.

Today is absolute bullshit.

I hate that I can't accept a hug right now.
